articles.description: Liam Lindsay heads in a Preston winner in the final minute in the Lancashire derby at Blackburn.
articles.title: Preston earn 90th-minute derby win at Blackburn

articles.description: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta warns Aaron Ramsdale not to rush any decision over his future after falling out of favour this season.
articles.title: Arteta warns Ramsdale not to rush decision on future

articles.description: Rassie van der Dussen hits an unbeaten 76 to take South Africa to a nervy five-wicket win over Afghanistan.
articles.title: Van der Dussen guides South Africa past Afghanistan

articles.description: Bath turned around a thrilling West Country derby to beat Gloucester at a sold-out Kingsholm.
articles.title: Bath come from behind to beat Gloucester

articles.description: South Africa's David Miller makes a meal of a catch, including hitting himself in the face with the ball, before holding on to remove Afghanistan's Rahmat Shah for 26 in their Cricket World Cup.
articles.title: 'He smashed himself in the face!' Miller takes juggling catch

articles.description: Sir Jim Ratcliffe's deal to become a minority shareholder in Manchester United is expected to be agreed during this month's international break, possibly as early as next week.
articles.title: Ratcliffe close to Man Utd minority stake agreement

articles.description: Tottenham midfielder James Maddison withdraws from the England squad for November's Euro 2024 qualifiers with an ankle injury.
articles.title: Maddison withdraws from England squad with injury

articles.description: Watch highlights as Rassie van der Dussen hits an unbeaten 76 to seal South Africa's nervy five-wicket win over Afghanistan to secure them a place in the semi-finals of the Cricket World Cup.
articles.title: South Africa complete nervy win over Afghanistan

articles.description: Britain's Jack Draper reaches his first ATP Tour final by beating Germany's Jan-Lennard Struff at the Sofia Open.
articles.title: Draper into first ATP Tour final in Sofia

articles.description: Trampolinist Bryony Page talks about her experience of the 'twisties', a form of sudden mental block that can cause a person to lose their sense of space and dimension as they're in the air.
articles.title: What are the 'twisties' in gymnastics?
